sentence: I am new to this area of Florida and had no idea what to expect when I pulled into the beautiful landscaped long entrance of this beautiful over the top hotel
The bathroom was massive with twin basins a large shower enclosure and all the usual accessories toiletries and lots of huge white fluffy towels

I was impressed with every part of the experience from the smooth efficient check in to the large comfortable room and bathroom to the excellent Bourbon Steak House and the complete well maintained gym
The amenities at the Resort are fabulous
Especially for the Kids who absolutely loved the daily morning experience of feeding and learning about the koi carp in the reception pond area
Standout Service and Amenities All Around
Many guest rooms also recently refurbishedI also enjoyed the property facilities over the weekend and it really does live up to a 5 hotel all round
All the amenities such as robes slippers Keurig were in the room
Joel their Director of Rooms was fantastic also and he gave us a very nice amenity making us feel very special
The gym is very clean and has a great variety of equipment
Restaurants good service The only restaurant that I frequented was for the breakfast buffet there is another more elegant one at the entrance which serves dinner and candidly is overpriced
People sleeping in lobby
In summation everyone at this property was rude and negligent except this nice older lady who gave us a tour of the spa amenities and encouraged us to come back when we had time
We booked Turnbery knowing that there was some construction on site but still hoping that the existing outstanding facilities and the great Miami location would make it a great holiday
Also the fitness center has a lot of equipment
The gym here remains excellent and the spa is OK they need investment there
Hotel property and amenities I would give 5 stars
It has all the amenities you need on site
5 star everything at this Mariot service staff facilities maintenance food
it is a bit of a hike to get to south beach but the accommodations are much nicer
The service has declined since our last visit while the amenities are top notch
She also told us we were entitled to half off drinks during happy hour 5 7 at the lobby bar
The lobby was total chaos
There are two main gift shops right at the front entrance where you can pay 8 dollars for 2 mountain dews or go to the golf pro shop right next to it

VIP badges were required to be worn at the resort which was one of the unique issues that was only for the Super Bowl but it helped cut back on randoms or non employees getting into events in the different ballrooms there were events in
The golf course was a little disappointing based in the hype but the accommodations were very nice
Did expect better facilities and service
Long inside halls much wider than actual hallways were carpeted and hard to pull or push luggage
